options.text: Give Ifetaya the Bandages from Lady Moira

nodes.text: Do you know how to talk to ghosts?
My mother's family, they are Spirit Talkers. So I, too, can speak with the ones who return from the Shadow Lands.
Can you teach me how to speak with the dead?
Why would you want to do such a thing, Mister Shawn-Shawn? It is dangerous. The ghosts, they will steal your life away.
It's just that I have met so many ghosts, and they all seem to be trying to say something to me.
The Duppies, they may talk, but Mister Shawn-Shawn, you may not want to listen to what they say. Think on this. If you still wish to be speaking to ghosts, speak with me again another time.
You know so many stories and tales. Do you happen to know anything about Tricksters?
Yes, of course, Tricksters, they are very important to Yoruba culture.
Could you please tell me something about them, then?
Very good, I shall tell you the tales of Anansi, the spider, and how he brought stories to all the world...
And that is how Anansi the spider became the keeper of all stories. Stories are treasures beyond measure, for they teach as well as they entertain.
Thank you for telling me all this about Anansi.
Stories are for sharing.

nodes.message: I removed "if not talkedToToday" check because it prevented some important conversation

nodes.text: Ifetaya seems very busy. I'll talk with her at a better time.

nodes.message: If Shawn missed dinner, he can charm Ifetaya into giving him food.

nodes.text: I was really busy learning important things and I lost track of time. Please, could I have something to eat?
I was helping a friend with a problem and it got late. I don't suppose that there's some leftovers from supper?
I know, I'm late again. It's just that there is so much going on right now and it's hard to think on an empty stomach...
I'm so hungry, I'm almost ready to cook a dead Drat. Can't you save me from such a culinary disaster?
The bowl of apples be there for anyone who is hungry. Next time, you need to be more prompt. We don't serve cold food here.
We do not waste food in my kitchen. When dinnertime is done, there is no more food. Eat an apple.
Late again - maybe you need to learn to keep better track of time.
Still, there is one leftover apple tart from dessert lessons today. We would not want to see you die of starvation because you be so busy.
Thank you so much!
